pages.text: The $(mob)Honey Bee$() is a creature that spawns in the $(thing)Overworld$(). It is immune to $(thing)Poison$() and falling damage. A $(thing)Honey Bee$() will not attack the player unless provoked, after which it will retaliate with ranged attacks before leaping into melee with attacks that have strong knockback. Attacking a $(mob)Honey Bee$() angers all others in the area, similar to the $(l:minecraft_zombie_pigman)$(mob)Zombie Pigman$().
$(mob)Honey Bees$() drop $(item)Honeydew$() on death. These are a decent source of food and provide a 20% speed and haste buff for 10 seconds.

$(mob)Honey Bees$() drop $(item)Iron Box$() on death, which can be right-clicked while in hand to open and receive a random tool, weapon, or armor piece made of iron. Alternatively, it can be smelted in a furnace to create $(item)Crystalized Experience (Small)$().
